name: INMessageType
desc: Constants indicating the type of content contained in a message.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The message content isnâ€™t specified.

items.name: case text
items.desc: The message content is text-based.

items.name: case animoji
items.desc: The message content is an animoji.

items.name: case audio
items.desc: The message contains audio content.

items.name: case digitalTouch
items.desc: The message contains digital touch content.

items.name: case handwriting
items.desc: The message contains handwritten content.

items.name: case sticker
items.desc: The message contains sticker content.

items.name: case link
items.desc: The message contains link content.

items.name: case file
items.desc: The message contains a file.

items.name: case activitySnippet
items.desc: The message contains an activity snippet.

items.name: case mediaCalendar
items.desc: Media content containing calendar data.

items.name: case mediaLocation
items.desc: Media content containing location data.

items.name: case mediaAddressCard
items.desc: Media content containing an address card.

items.name: case mediaImage
items.desc: Media content containing an image.

items.name: case mediaVideo
items.desc: Media content containing video.

items.name: case mediaPass
items.desc: Media content containing PassKit data.

items.name: case mediaAudio
items.desc: Media content containing audio.

items.name: case paymentNote
items.desc: Content indicating the message contains notes about a payment.

items.name: case paymentRequest
items.desc: Content indicating the message contains payment request information.

items.name: case paymentSent
items.desc: Content indicating the message contains sent payment information.

items.name: case tapbackLiked
items.desc: Content indicating that the user liked something.

items.name: case tapbackDisliked
items.desc: Content indicating that the user disliked something.

items.name: case tapbackEmphasized
items.desc: Content indicating that the user emphasized something.

items.name: case tapbackLoved
items.desc: Content indicating that the user loved something.

items.name: case tapbackQuestioned
items.desc: Content indicating that the user questioned something.

items.name: case tapbackLaughed
items.desc: Content indicating that the user laughed at something.
